inspirational: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
joke: What do you call two monkeys who share an Amazon account?

inspirational: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
joke: I told my wife she needs to start embracing her mistakes.

inspirational: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
joke: Why did Novak Djokovic pay for his flight to Australia with a Mastercard?

inspirational: Life has got all those twists and turns. You've got to hold on tight and off you go.
joke: Who is the most lonely billionaire?

inspirational: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
joke: What is the scariest tree?

inspirational: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
joke: My wife and I let astrology get between us.

inspirational: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
joke: What do you call a coupon-using vampire?

inspirational: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
joke: Why can't you send a duck to space?
punchline: Because the bill would be astronomical.

inspirational: Spread love everywhere you go.
joke: Where do you find a cow with no legs?

inspirational: Do not allow people to dim your shine because they are blinded. Tell them to put some sunglasses on.
joke: Why did Karen press Ctrl+Shift+Delete?
punchline: Because she wanted to see the task manager.

inspirational: You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
joke: What language do people speak in the middle of the earth?

inspirational: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
joke: Why are bakers so rich?

inspirational: Belief creates the actual fact.
joke: I can't find my 'Gone in 60 seconds' DVD...
punchline: It was here a minute ago.

inspirational: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
joke: Why are spiders so smart?
punchline: They can find everything on the web.

inspirational: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
joke: Why does Waldo wear a striped shirt?
punchline: Because he doesn't want to be spotted.

inspirational: Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is the key to happiness.
joke: How do you get a blind person to see?

inspirational: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
joke: How was Rome split in two?

inspirational: Weaknesses are just strengths in the wrong environment.
joke: What kind of doctor is Dr. Pepper?

inspirational: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
joke: My son got angry when I told him 'Sky is the limit for you'.
punchline: He wants to be an astronaut.

inspirational: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
joke: What happens when it rains cats and dogs?
punchline: You have to be careful not to step in a poodle.

inspirational: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
joke: I accidentally rubbed ketchup in my eyes.

inspirational: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
joke: I had a great joke about COVID...
punchline: but I don't wanna spread it around.

inspirational: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
joke: What do you call a laughing jar of mayonnaise?

inspirational: Wake up determined, go to bed satisfied.
joke: Did you hear about the cheese that's been working out?

inspirational: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
joke: What do you need to make a small fortune on Wall Street?

inspirational: Nobody built like you, you design yourself.
joke: Whoever stole my depression medication...

inspirational: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
joke: Vin Diesel eats two meals a day.

inspirational: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
joke: I finally got around to watching that documentary on clocks.

inspirational: Don't try to lessen yourself for the world; let the world catch up to you.
joke: Why did Hitler wear eye glasses?
punchline: Because without them he could Nazi.

inspirational: There's nothing more powerful than not giving a f--k
joke: Why can't a leopard hide?

inspirational: Out of the mountain of despair, a stone of hope.
joke: I think your DNA is backwards.

inspirational: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
joke: What do you call two monkeys who share an Amazon account?
